column2: In the UK, how many days of annual leave do employees receive?
column5:
UK employees receive 25 days of paid annual leave per year.

Reference:
1. 3 - Annual Leave.txt

Let me know if you need more details or have other questions.

column2: Can unused annual leave be carried over for EU employees?
column3: Yes, up to 5 days can be carried over.
column5:
Yes, for EU employees, up to 5 days of unused annual leave can be carried over.

Reference:
1. 3 - Annual Leave.txt

column2: How often should employees change their passwords?
column5:
Employees must change their passwords every 90 days.

Reference:
1. 4 - IT Security.txt

column2: Can I claim for lunch expenses when working in the office?
column3: No, only when working away from the home office.
column5:
You cannot claim lunch expenses when working in the office. Meal costs are reimbursable only when working away from the home office.

Reference:
1. 2 - Expenses.txt

Let me know if you need more details or have other questions.

column2: In the US, how far in advance should I request annual leave?
column3: At least one week in advance.
column5:
In the US, you should submit your annual leave request at least one week in advance.

Reference:
1. 3 - Annual Leave.txt

Let me know if you need more details or have other questions.

column2: What should I do if I suspect a security incident?
column5:
If you suspect a security incident, you should:

- Immediately report the incident to the IT Security team using the designated incident reporting channel.
- Do not attempt to investigate or resolve the incident on your own.
- Preserve any evidence related to the incident (e.g., emails, files, screenshots).
- Follow any additional instructions provided by the IT Security team.

Reference:
1. Information Security Policy

Let me know if you need more details or specific reporting procedures.

column2: How many remote days can I work each week?
column3: Up to three days per week.
column5:
You may work remotely up to three days per week. All remote work must be agreed in advance with your line manager.

Reference:
1. 1 - Remote Working.txt

Let me know if you need more details or have other questions.

Remote work must be approved by the employee’s direct manager. Reference:
1. Remote Work Policy

column2: What’s the company’s carbon reduction target?
column5:
The company’s carbon reduction target is to reduce carbon emissions by 20% by 2030.

Reference:

column2: What’s the rule on sharing company laptops?
column3: They must not be shared with anyone outside the organisation.
column5:
- Company laptops must not be shared with anyone outside the organisation.

Reference:
